publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4031 Ben Wallace: Support for Armed Forces-That the Parliament supports the men and women of Her Majesty's armed forces during the difficult and dangerous task of disarming the brutal Iraqi regime and further extends its support to the families and loved ones of members of the armed forces based in Scotland or of Scottish units abroad during this uncertain time.
S1M-4031 Support for Armed Forces (lodged on 18 March 2003) Christine Grahame*, John Scott*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-4031 Support for Armed Forces (lodged on 18 March 2003) Stewart Stevenson*, David Mundell*, Murdo Fraser*, Alex Johnstone*

S1M-4031 Ben Wallace: Support for Armed Forces—That the Parliament supports the men and women of Her Majesty’s armed forces during the difficult and dangerous task of disarming the brutal Iraqi regime and further extends its support to the families and loved ones of members of the armed forces based in Scotland or of Scottish units abroad during this uncertain time. Supported by: Christine Grahame, John Scott, Mr Keith Harding, Stewart Stevenson, David Mundell, Murdo Fraser, Alex Johnstone
S1M-4031 Support for Armed Forces (lodged on 18 March 2003) Phil Gallie*
S1M-4031 Support for Armed Forces (lodged on 18 March 2003) Mr Brian Monteith*, Bill Aitken*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-4031 Support for Armed Forces (lodged on 18 March 2003) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-4031 Ben Wallace: Support for Armed Forces—That the Parliament supports the men and women of Her Majesty’s armed forces during the difficult and dangerous task of disarming the brutal Iraqi regime and further extends its support to the families and loved ones of members of the armed forces based in Scotland or of Scottish units abroad during this uncertain time. Supported by: Christine Grahame, John Scott, Mr Keith Harding, Stewart Stevenson, David Mundell, Murdo Fraser, Alex Johnstone, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Bill Aitken, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr David Davidson
